text: Mark Strong (born Marco Giuseppe Salussolia; 5 August 1963) is an English actor. He is known for his roles in movies such as Stardust, RocknRolla, Body of Lies, Sherlock Holmes, Kick-Ass, Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy, Zero Dark Thirty, The Imitation Game, Kingsman: The Secret Service, and its sequel Kingsman: The Golden Circle. In 2011, he played Thaal Sinestro, Green Lantern's mentor, in the superhero movie Green Lantern. Strong also played Doctor Thaddeus Sivana in the DC Extended Universe superhero movie Shazam! (2019). In 2024, he played a younger Carmine Falcone in the DC Studies limited series The Penguin. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London
title: Mark Strong
